review.comment: The entire staff is so kind to my 90 year old mother.
review.review_reply: Thank You for the kind review

review.comment: Super nice! So friendly!  Best dentist I have EVER been to
review.review_reply: Thank you for the Review Cathy

review.comment:
Marino Family Dentistry is an Amazing Dentist Office in Orange Park Florida. They Have Many Different Services To Keep Your Smile Beautiful.
Ask for Special 4 Legged Staff Member.
review.review_reply: Thank you for reaching out and giving us a great review

review.comment: What an amazing experience with Marino Family Dentistry. Very professional staff, state of the art technology and a great atmosphere. I would recommend Dr. Marino for anyone looking to establish a dental home.
review.review_reply: Thank you Juan, We are glad your experience was top notch.

review.comment: I love dr Marino and staff always friendly and care about your care and experience! It’s a plus getting to see his dog Leo when I go he’s so adorable! I highly recommend them to everyone!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Tammy! :) we all enjoy having you

review.comment: Since arriving at Dr. Marino’s office the staff and hygienist’s have been extremely courteous and professional.  Always asking how you are after procedures is very reassuring they care about your well being. Never rushed out to bring in the next patient.  I know me and my family are in great hands.  So much so, I have referred my work colleagues.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for the kind review Jim 😊. It’s our pleasure to have you and your family at our office.

review.comment: The employees were very friendly and helpful. The cleaning was excellent and Dr. Marino and Leo were awesome as well!
review.review_reply: Thank you Andrew for the great review! Leo says woof thanks as well 🐶

review.comment: Welcoming staff and Dr. Marino is educated and super helpful! Office dog is just the cherry on top of a great experience.
review.review_reply: LEO Aka "office dog" welcomes you back. :-)

review.comment: Best dentist! Love, love, love Leo!!!
review.review_reply: ... and Leo loves you back. Thanks for the review Liz.
Thank you for the shout out Brianna.

review.comment: I was nervous to go back to the dentist because I hadn’t been in a few years and had a bad experience previously, but Dr. Marino and staff made everything easy and as painless as possible. Dr. Marino is caring and professional. The staff is friendly and fun and if you get Q, you get a lovely concert thrown in. They also have a lovely modern facility and Netflix made everything easier lol.
review.review_reply: Welcome to our family, Amanda. Thank you for the review.

review.comment: After many years of not being able to go to the dentist, I finally grew courage to be seen. I picked this location mainly off of location purposes. To my surprise the office was beautiful! The front desk, and the dental assistant were amazing! Q who helped me was so sweet. I initially felt bad for who ever got me because I know my teeth are in rough shape. Q made sure I was completely comfortable and helped me more then she will ever know. I left being able to smile more confident than ever. And a huge thank you to Dr. Marino for going out of his way to take 6 years of braces glue off of my teeth. Even though it doesn’t seem like much, that little fix helped bring confidence back to my smile. It took 20 minutes to fix something that has bothered me for 6 years! I will be back to visit! 🙌🏼
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for taking the time to write this very kind review Morgan! It was our pleasure to take care of you and get your confidence back 😊

review.comment: Dr Marino s office and staff are great super friendly and professional.Always a great experience .Highly recommend.Myslef and all three of my children go here
review.review_reply: Thank You for the review. It means a lot. Leo says hello.

review.comment: Very clean and nice place. Dr marino is very caring, professional, and makes you feel at ease. Also everyone in the office is very friendly. Short wait as well.
review.review_reply: The staff thanks you.

review.comment: For someone that has a fear of dentistry, felt totally at ease and comfortable. I started out by finding a dentist for my son who resides in Orange Park. The reviews were great and Leo well he won me over. I travel 40 mins out of my way to come to this practice and will keep coming. Dr. Marino has a great bedside manner that be beyond wonderful and his office staff is so friendly and accommodating. My favorite is Q as she made me feel great while having my cleaning done. She’s a great singer too!! It really helped Q!! So if you want a great dentist with state of the art dental technology and a welcoming environment please give Dr Marino and his staff a try. Plus Dr Leo 🐶 just makes the experience even better.
review.review_reply: Thank you Arlene for the wonderful review! It means a lot to hear that you had such a great experience with us. We all look forward to seeing you next time :)

review.comment: I hate going to the dentist. My parents introduced me to this place and I always feel welcomed and their dog is so precious!
review.review_reply: Leo says Ruff

review.comment: Dr Marino is a great dentist I have been seeing him for over a year now. Had my first cavity as an adult was super nervous going in as I was expecting the experience to be painful. Dr Marino was very gentle kept checking in on me to make sure I was ok and was very detail oriented in his work. Me and my kids love it here. Highly reccomend this dentist.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Tashonna! We are happy to have you and your family with us 😊

review.comment: Immaculate facility, very professional staff. My dental hygienist “Q” was awesome and an amazing singer!
review.review_reply: Thank you very much Ron! Q is already practicing for your next appointment haha

review.comment: Very informative and gentle. They are professional and kind. They make you feel at ease.
review.review_reply: Thank you Tony for the nice review :)

review.comment: I struggled to find a family practice I could be with until now. I was referred to this practice by a current patient and could not be more satisfied with my experience and the overwhelming professionalism and friendly caring atmosphere they give with every visit. If you search the reviews as I do then stop look no further as you’ve found the right place!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Robby for this special review! We are happy you joined the family :)

review.comment: As a teenager, I had many scary moments at the dentist. In recent years, I began to outgrow those fears mainly due to encouraging friends. I was recommended to the 'Marino Family Dentistry' by a friend. The staff is very warm and inviting. Dr. Marino is very comforting and reassuring. He listens and takes time with me. Check him out. You will be glad you did!!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Mrs. Dee :) we are so happy you found us and all enjoy seeing you at the office

review.comment: I put two stars a few weeks ago, very impressed that the doctor called to ensure my satisfaction, certainly deserving of 6 stars!! - Mike
review.review_reply: Thank you Michael for the review. We pride ourselves in giving the best patient care we can.

review.comment:
So my wife is terrified of dentists and I am not. She loves this place, I mean LOVES this place, especially Leo the dog. She bragged about Marino Family Dentistry so much our daughter became a part of their patient family. I stopped by with my wife last week.

I was so impressed with the ambiance, personalities and professionalism of Marissa, Natalie, and Jo, I jumped at the chance to become a new member of the Marino patient family. Leo was glad I came back. He even stopped by to welcome me to the family.

Jenn's confidence and skill, along with the clarity in which Dr. Marino explained my treatment plan, has me feeling good, knowing how great my smile is going to look and feel whether it's behind a mask or not.

We found ourselves a dentistry winner in the  area code 904. They're right in Orange Park.

Don't cheat yourself, treat yourself to the best dentist in town!

Thank you all.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Jason for this incredible review!! We are blown away by your kind words, it really means a lot to all of us :)

review.comment:
Best dental experience I’ve ever had!!!!

It all began when I walked through the door. The office lady was so nice. And my wait was very short. Jen the hygienists was so nice and gentle. Then dr Marino came in and was very kind and thorough. The dog was the cherry on top.

I’ll be referring all of my friends and family to this office.
review.review_reply: Thank you Deborah, smile on.

review.comment: Doc is the best dentist around! Staff was extremely welcoming and helpful. I highly recommend!
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words Nik!

review.comment: Office very nice and pretty. Doctor is good. The girl who cleaned did rough. She was not friendly and seem off
review.review_reply: We are sorry you felt that way. We had a team meeting to make sure we all continuously are gentle and making sure you feel the best as best as we can. Patient care and relaxation is our top priority. We know how stressful and anxieties can come with office visits. Our modern facility is equipped with all forms of media to use and distract. :-)

review.comment:
Dr. Marino and his staff are awesome.  From the front desk to the dental care providers in the clinic the service I receive is second to none.  They are competent, courteous, professional and friendly.  I have been particularly impressed with the patient education they provide which has aided me in sustainably improving my overall dental health. Dr. Lindhart  would be pleased.

Update: February 8, 2021

Today’s visit reaffirmed my appreciation for Dr. Marino and his staff.  It’s a blessing to have a team who wants nothing but the absolute best for their patients.  They will not cut corners, but are conscientious to take the time to make sure any procedure is done right.  Thanks guys; I appreciate you!
review.review_reply: Thank You.

review.comment:
I can't say enough about how fabulous Marino Family Dentistry is.  The staff is phenomenal and Dr. Marino makes sure that he tends to each patient, checking in multiple times per visit.  My very first experience with Marino Family Dentistry was due to a broken molar, which was cutting my mouth and would require a crown.  The practice where I was a patient wouldn't see me, they claimed they were closed at 2:30 p.m. I called multiple emergency dental offices that were booked.

I called Dr. Marino's office on the advice of a friend, it was 4:40 pm.  He was walking out the door but stayed and waited for me. He smoothed the tooth out and a follow up appointment was made for the crown.  I just had my x-rays and cleaning.  By far the best dental cleaning experience I've had in 37 years.

Visit Marino Family Dentistry, where you'll be treated like family and get superior service in a relaxing environment.  I have another appointment in a few weeks

No better way to spend the after noon than at the dentist.  Check out Marino Family Dentistry ya'll.  I'm relaxed and never been able to say that about the dentist.  Check them out, you won't be disappointed!
review.review_reply: Thank you for the very kind words Micah, it means a lot. We are glad we were able to help when you needed it :)

review.comment: Dr. Marino and his staff are highly skilled and very professional. The office looks great as well. This practice earned all 5 stars.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for the positive review Michael! We really appreciate it

review.comment:
I have always taken good care of my teeth, but not always had the best Dentists. Turns out that a couple of those Dentists had actually caused me dental problems. Finally, I have found Dr. Marino, his wonderful Staff and Leo the office dog! He is a Dentist that truly makes me feel comfortable and confident in a Dental visit. Among my other first time dental procedures at Marino Family Dentistry, I have Invisalign’s! My Invisalign experience so far has been great thanks to Dr. Marino!
The Invisalign's are not as bad as I have been told. I am really looking forward to seeing the end results! Dr. Marino has the best Office Staff. I was amazed recently that they were happy to combine two appointments for me. No matter what the issues have been, his Staff has taken care of every detail. Dr. Marino’s new office has Streaming with earphones, sunglasses, Crowns are made in house, and of course, a friendly greeting from Leo the office dog. These are just a few of the conveniences he provides.
Marino Family Dentistry is a wonderful place for anyone!
review.review_reply: I give you 5 paws. Leo the office dog. 🦮

review.comment: Dr Marino is a great dentist!! Our hygienist Jenn gets the HIGHEST marks possible for thoroughness, gentleness, and friendliness!! Cannot recommend this office highly enough!! His office staff are friendly and knowledgeable about insurance and billing!! Well Done!!
review.review_reply: Thank You John for the kind words.

review.comment: Coming here is so easy! Dentist visits have always stressed me but they make  it easy
review.review_reply: Smile on Kay. Thank You for the review.

review.comment: I could definitely write a book about how incredible this office is. I am blown away by the results of my visits here. I’ve been to many dentist and until this one I never could go without feeling as if I wasted my time. Dr. Marino not only gave me my confidence back but gave me the prettiest smile. I was born missing one of my front teeth and one that was extremely tiny (I always called it my shark tooth) as you can imagine I was always insecure about it. Growing up going from Dr. to Dr. I have never met any Dr. that would actually sit down and listen to my concerns. I was heard at this Dr. office and I fell in love with the entire staff. Each and everyone one of them would get excited with me for each appointment until I got my final results! With all this being said, this is hands down the BEST dentist I’ve ever been to and I will forever recommend going to them.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Katie for this kind and thoughtful review. It was a pleasure working with you and we are thankful we were able to be a part of your dental journey :)

review.comment: Recently switched dentist offices and I am so happy with our decision. Such a great office with experienced staff. Nice and clean! Really great at communicating appointments to procedures being done. Really enjoying my experience so far!
review.review_reply: We welcome you with all your smiles.

review.comment: Was a long time patient of Dr. Lindhardt and was welcomed back by Dr. Marino’s warm staff. I was impressed with the new office and appreciate the time that Jen spent with me. Dr. Marino was very thorough and Leo, his office dog, was a hit!!!
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words.

review.comment: Love this dentist!! All the staff is professional and they all have a smile on their face and you can tell they all love what they’re doing. The new location is beautiful! Dr. Marino is great and they have an office dog!! ❤️
review.review_reply: Leo can't stop Barking about you. He has a review.

review.comment: Super friendly and helpful.

Everyone here was so nice and helpful! The new office is very clean and modern. My hygienist knew how much pain I was in and did everything should could to make taking x-rays as painless as possible! Highly recommend if you are looking for a new denist!

Being a former dental tech for the United States Marines for seven years, I find that Dr. Marino and his staff to be very professional as well as courteous and caring for his patients. I went to see Dr. Marino for a crown and was impressed with his state of the art technology with his same-day placing a new crown using a 3-D image. I walked out of his office with zero discomfort and could not believe how easy the whole process was. And on top of all that Dr. Marino called to check on me himself, what a class act. Kenny Keefer
Y'all are awesome thanks
Very nice facility, kind and helpful staff and I just love Leo! 🐶
Awesome staff - very friendly and considerate of your needs. Dr. Marino is great! He listens to your concerns and is very thorough in addressing them. Wonderful dentist - I highly recommend!!

What an amazing office!  The office is beautiful, office staff goes above and beyond and Dr. Marino is wonderful.  I’ve never had a dentist call to check on my recovery before, but Dr. Marino takes that extra step!

Dr Marino and his staff give professional and compassionate care.  I could not be happier with the care I have been receiving.  If you are anxious or fearful they will put you at ease and you never need to feel embarrassed.  I am very thankful this practice is taking care of me.   It is so nice to visit a practice where the doctor and staff are happy.  Even Leo is ready to ease your fears.
Friendly and professional
